name: Search_Hotels_By_Coordinates

docs_row.name: Search_Hotels_By_Coordinates
docs_row.func_description: Search for hotels around a given geographical coordinates.

latitude.description: Latitude of the searched location. latitude can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/locationToLatLong(Location to Lat Long) endpoint in Meta collection.

longitude.description: Longitude of the searched location. longitude can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/locationToLatLong(Location to Lat Long) endpoint in Meta collection.

arrival_date.description: The date on which you will arrive or check-in

departure_date.description: The date of departure or check-out.

radius.description:
The hotels that are within the radius. The radius is measured in kilometers.
Default is set to 100.
Range is between 10 to 500.

adults.description: The number of guests who are 18 years of age or older. The default value is set to 1.

children_age.description:
The number of children, including infants, who are under 18.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
children_age: 0,1,17

room_qty.description: The number of rooms that are required. The default value is set to 1.

units.description: The measurement of distance in metric or imperial.

temperature_unit.description:
The temperature unit in Fahrenheit or Celsius.
c = Celsius
f = Fahrenheit

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

location.description: location can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLocations(Get Location) endpoint in Meta collection.

latitude.description: Latitude of the searched location. latitude can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/locationToLatLong(Location to Lat Long) endpoint in Meta collection.

longitude.description: Longitude of the searched location. longitude can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/locationToLatLong(Location to Lat Long) endpoint in Meta collection.

result.urgency_message: Only 1 left at this price on Booking.com

items.details: You’re getting a reduced rate because this property is offering a discount.
items.name: Bonus savings

result.hotel_name: Palette Palghar Irayos Resort Lifestyle Retreat
result.hotel_name_trans: Palette Palghar Irayos Resort Lifestyle Retreat

benefits.details: You’re getting a reduced rate compared to the rate available on a computer or laptop.

response_summary:
Here’s a summary of the hotel search results for your trip:  

There are 4,270 available properties matching your criteria, with three standout options highlighted.  

First, the **Cherryleen Resort Nagaon** is a 3-star hotel priced at **₹19,440 (approx. $227)** for five nights. Rated **8.7 ("Fabulous")** from 44 reviews, it offers free cancellation, a swimming pool, and free parking. Check-in is from 12:00 PM to 5:30 PM, and check-out is by 11:00 AM.  

Next, the **Palette Palghar Irayos Resort Lifestyle Retreat** in Mumbai is a **5-star** property with a **9.1 ("Superb")** rating from 26 reviews. The discounted rate is **₹15,095 (approx. $176)** for five nights, down from the original **₹16,896 (approx. $320)**. It also allows free cancellation and has flexible check-in times.  

Lastly, the **Wabi Sabi Resort in Igatpuri** is a **4-star** retreat with a **7.6 ("Good")** rating from 48 reviews. It offers a **mobile-exclusive discount**, bringing the price down to **₹34,560 (approx. $404)** from **₹38,707 (approx. $449)**. This resort includes a swimming pool and free parking, with check-in between 2:00 PM and 6:00 PM.  

You can filter results by **budget, bed preference, and room facilities**, and all three properties listed support free cancellation. If you're looking for luxury, the **Palette Palghar** stands out, while the **Cherryleen Resort** offers great value for a mid-range stay.
enhance_func_desc: This API is ideal for travelers looking for hotel accommodations near specific geographic coordinates. It searches hotels based on latitude and longitude, with filters for price range, room quantity, and guest details (adults/children). The response includes hotel ratings, pricing, amenities, and cancellation policies. Users can refine results by distance (radius) and sort by budget or preferences. Coordinates must be obtained from the LocationToLatLong API.

enhanced_parameters.latitude: Latitude coordinate for hotel search location.
enhanced_parameters.longitude: Longitude coordinate for hotel search location.
enhanced_parameters.radius: Search radius in kilometers (10-500km) from coordinates.
enhanced_parameters.room_qty: Number of rooms required for booking.
enhanced_parameters.price_min: Minimum price filter for hotel results.
enhanced_parameters.price_max: Maximum price filter for hotel results.

primary_count.description: The total number of primary hotel search results available (e.g., 4270).

count.description: The total number of hotel search results available (e.g., 4270).

filters.description: A list of available filters for refining the hotel search results.

ar_items.description: An object representing a filter option.

field.description: The field identifier for the filter (e.g., 'price', 'tdb', 'roomfacility').

title.description: The display title of the filter (e.g., 'Your budget (for 5 nights)').

page_loading_threshold.description: The threshold for loading additional results (e.g., 10).

applied_filters.description: A list of filters currently applied to the search results.

b_max_los_data.description: Data related to the maximum length of stay (LOS) for bookings.

default_los.description: The default maximum length of stay in days (e.g., 45).

has_extended_los.description: Indicates if extended length of stay is available (1 for yes, 0 for no).

extended_los.description: The extended maximum length of stay in days (e.g., 90).

experiment.description: The experiment identifier related to extended stays (e.g., 'long_stays_ios_extend_los_2').

max_allowed_los.description: The absolute maximum allowed length of stay in days (e.g., 90).

is_fullon.description: Indicates if the property is fully booked (1 for yes, 0 for no).

extended_count.description: The count of extended stay options available (e.g., 0).

has_low_availability.description: Indicates if the property has low availability (empty if not applicable).

room_distribution.description: A list of room distribution configurations.

ar_items.description: An object representing room distribution details.

children.description: A list of children configurations (empty if none).

unfiltered_count.description: The total number of unfiltered hotel search results (e.g., 5033).

unfiltered_primary_count.description: The total number of unfiltered primary hotel search results (e.g., 5033).

result.description: A list of hotel search results.

ar_items.description: An object representing a hotel search result.

hotel_id.description: The unique identifier for the hotel (e.g., 11361227).

default_wishlist_name.description: The default name for the wishlist where the hotel can be saved (e.g., 'Nagaon').

id.description: The unique identifier for the property card (e.g., 'property_card_11361227').

extended.description: Indicates if the stay is extended (1 for yes, 0 for no).

review_score_word.description: The textual representation of the review score (e.g., 'Fabulous').

is_genius_deal.description: Indicates if the deal is a Genius deal (1 for yes, 0 for no).

default_language.description: The default language for the hotel (e.g., 'xu').

hotel_name_trans.description: The translated name of the hotel (e.g., 'Cherryleen Resort Nagaon').

updated_checkout.description: Indicates if the checkout time has been updated (null if not).

soldout.description: Indicates if the hotel is sold out (1 for yes, 0 for no).

unit_configuration_label.description: The label describing the unit configuration (e.g., 'Hotel room: 1 bed').

preferred.description: Indicates if the hotel is a preferred option (1 for yes, 0 for no).

class.description: The star rating of the hotel (e.g., 3).

ufi.description: A unique identifier for the hotel location (e.g., -2105314).

review_score.description: The numerical review score of the hotel (e.g., 8.7).

genius_discount_percentage.description: The percentage discount for Genius deals (e.g., 0).

children_not_allowed.description: Indicates if children are not allowed (null if not specified).

preferred_plus.description: Indicates if the hotel is a preferred plus option (1 for yes, 0 for no).

city_in_trans.description: The translated city name where the hotel is located (e.g., 'in Nagaon').

min_total_price.description: The minimum total price for the stay in the hotel's currency (e.g., 19440).

main_photo_url.description: The URL of the main photo of the hotel.

class_is_estimated.description: Indicates if the star rating is estimated (1 for yes, 0 for no).

block_ids.description: A list of block identifiers for the hotel.

is_tpi_exclusive_property.description: Indicates if the property is exclusive to TPI (1 for yes, 0 for no).

bwallet.description: Details about the hotel's eligibility for B-Wallet.

hotel_eligibility.description: Indicates if the hotel is eligible for B-Wallet (1 for yes, 0 for no).

has_free_parking.description: Indicates if the hotel offers free parking (1 for yes, 0 for no).

updated_checkin.description: Indicates if the check-in time has been updated (null if not).

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate of the hotel's location (e.g., 18.619497213225).

has_swimming_pool.description: Indicates if the hotel has a swimming pool (1 for yes, 0 for no).

currencycode.description: The currency code for the hotel's pricing (e.g., 'INR').

is_smart_deal.description: Indicates if the deal is a Smart deal (1 for yes, 0 for no).

urgency_message.description: A message indicating urgency (e.g., 'Only 1 left at this price on Booking.com').

cant_book.description: Indicates if the hotel cannot be booked (null if not specified).

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate of the hotel's location (e.g., 72.899979171893).

countrycode.description: The country code where the hotel is located (e.g., 'in').

hotel_name.description: The name of the hotel (e.g., 'Cherryleen Resort Nagaon').

hotel_include_breakfast.description: Indicates if breakfast is included (1 for yes, 0 for no).

is_geo_rate.description: Indicates if the rate is geo-specific (empty if not applicable).

is_no_prepayment_block.description: Indicates if no prepayment is required (1 for yes, 0 for no).

hotel_has_vb_boost.description: Indicates if the hotel has VB boost (1 for yes, 0 for no).

badges.description: A list of badges associated with the hotel.

timezone.description: The timezone of the hotel's location (e.g., 'Asia/Kolkata').

review_nr.description: The number of reviews for the hotel (e.g., 44).

main_photo_id.description: The unique identifier for the main photo of the hotel (e.g., 519387542).

is_free_cancellable.description: Indicates if the booking is free cancellable (1 for yes, 0 for no).

composite_price_breakdown.description: A detailed breakdown of the pricing for the stay.

value.description: The numerical value of the amount per night (e.g., 45.4617110946166).

gross_amount.description: The gross total amount for the stay.

value.description: The numerical value of the total amount (e.g., 227.308555473083).

currency.description: The currency of the total amount (e.g., 'USD').

all_inclusive_amount_hotel_currency.description: The all-inclusive amount in the hotel's currency.

value.description: The numerical value of the all-inclusive amount (e.g., 21772.7999478579).

currency.description: The currency of the all-inclusive amount (e.g., 'INR').

items.description: A list of items included in the price breakdown.

ar_items.description: An object representing an item in the price breakdown.

base.description: The base details of the item.

base_amount.description: The base amount for the item (e.g., 0).

inclusion_type.description: The inclusion type of the item (e.g., 'excluded', 'included').

name.description: The name of the item (e.g., 'Goods & services tax').

details.description: Additional details about the item (null if none).

item_amount.description: The amount details for the item.

currency.description: The currency of the item amount (e.g., 'USD').

value.description: The numerical value of the item amount (e.g., 27.27702665677).

benefits.description: A list of benefits included in the price.

amount.description: The amount of the additional charge.

value.description: The numerical value of the charge (e.g., 27).

translated_copy.description: The translated copy of the charge details (empty if none).

ar_items.description: An object representing a price display configuration.

included_taxes_and_charges_amount.description: The amount of included taxes and charges.

amount_unrounded.description: The unrounded amount of included taxes and charges (e.g., 'US$0').

value.description: The numerical value of the included taxes and charges (e.g., 0).

currency.description: The currency of the included taxes and charges (e.g., 'USD').

amount_rounded.description: The rounded amount of included taxes and charges (e.g., 'US$0').

has_long_stays_monthly_rate_price.description: Indicates if there is a monthly rate price for long stays (1 for yes, 0 for no).

has_long_stays_weekly_rate_price.description: Indicates if there is a weekly rate price for long stays (1 for yes, 0 for no).

all_inclusive_amount.description: The all-inclusive amount for the stay.

currency.description: The currency of the all-inclusive amount (e.g., 'USD').

value.description: The numerical value of the all-inclusive amount (e.g., 254.585581520164).

net_amount.description: The net amount for the stay.

value.description: The numerical value of the net amount (e.g., 227.308555473083).

currency.description: The currency of the net amount (e.g., 'USD').

gross_amount_hotel_currency.description: The gross amount in the hotel's currency.

value.description: The numerical value of the gross amount (e.g., 19440).

currency.description: The currency of the gross amount (e.g., 'INR').

excluded_amount.description: The amount excluded from the total price.

currency.description: The currency of the excluded amount (e.g., 'USD').

value.description: The numerical value of the excluded amount (e.g., 27.27702665677).

city.description: The city where the hotel is located (e.g., 'Nagaon').

last_reservation_data.description: Data about the last reservation for the hotel.

last_reservation_ellapsed_months.description: The number of months since the last reservation (e.g., 1).

distances.description: A list of distances to nearby points of interest.
